titles.title: QI-1s Medicare Cost-Sharing Extension Act of 2003
A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to extend medicare cost-sharing for certain qualifying individuals (QI-1s).
QI-1s Medicare Cost-Sharing Extension Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: QI-1s Medicare Cost-Sharing Extension Act of 2003 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to extend Medicare cost-sharing for certain qualifying individuals (QI-1s).
